duties_responsibilities.duty: Apply electrical engineering principles to design and develop consumer products such as wireless remote controls and openers.
Analyze, debug, and test digital and analog circuits with limited complexity.
Perform impedance matching of radio frequency circuits and antennas.
Capture schematics and PCB design using Altium Designer.
Simulate hardware circuits and write design specifications and test reports.
Contribute within a cross-functional team environment and support other hardware and firmware engineers.

education_certification.credential: Rising Senior standing towards a bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering or related field.
